Residue Basic Groups

Alanina (ALA) Represents all alanina residues contained in the protein
Arginine (ARG) Represents all arginine residues contained in the protein.
Asparagine (ASN) Represents the all asparagine residues contained in the protein.
Aspartic (ASP) Represents the all aspartic residues contained in the protein.
Cysteine (CYS) Represents the all cysteine residues in the protein.
Glutamine (GLN) Represents the all glutamine residues in the protein.
Glutamic (GLU) Represents the all glutamic residues in the protein.
Glicine (GLY) Represents the all glicine residues contained in the protein.
Histidine (HIS) Represents the all histidine residues contained in the protein.
Isoleucine (ILE) Represents the all isoleucine residues in the protein.
Leucine (LEU) Represents the all leucine residues contained in the protein.
Lysine (LYS) Represents the all lysine residues contained in the protein.
Methionine (MET) Represents the all methionine residues contained in the protein.
Phenylalanine (PHE) Represents the all phenylalanine residues contained in the protein.
Proline (PRO) Represents the all proline residues contained in the protein.
Serine (SER) Represents the all Serine residues contained in the protein.
Threonine (THR) Represents the all threonine residues contained in the protein.
Tryptophan (TRP) Represents the all tryptophan residues contained in the protein.
Tyrosine (TYR) Represents the all tyrosine residues contained in the protein.
Valine (VAL) Represents the all valine residues contained in the protein.
